members.member:
Represents a Kanban control which is used for visualizing and managing the workflow of any process, like the software development process, in an effective way.
type will be the default content in the XAML representation of Kanban.
.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes new instance of class.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ItemTapped
member.summary: Occurs when a card is tapped.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.DragStart
member.summary: Occurs when the user starts to drag a card.
member.remarks: Using property, user can set a value that will determine whether to hide the actual card in the source column while the preview of the card is being dragged. Default value is false; hence, the actual card will be hidden when a user starts to drag a card. If it is set to true, card will not be hidden. This event can be cancelled using property. When it is cancelled, card cannot be dragged.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.DragEnd
member.summary: Occurs when the card is dropped.
member.remarks: This event can be cancelled using property. When this event is cancelled, card will not be dropped on to the target column. However, dragging will be stopped and the dragged card will stay in its source column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.DragEnter
member.summary: Occurs when a card is dragged into the target .
member.remarks: This event can be cancelled using property. When the event is cancelled, DragOver event will not be fired when the card is moved over the . It also means the user will not be able to drop the card over the current target column.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.DragLeave
member.summary: Occurs when a card is dragged out of the .

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.DragOver
member.summary: Occurs when a card is dragged over the .
member.remarks: This event can be used to disallow a dragged card from being dropped on a particular position in the target column by cancelling the event using property. Current position can be determined using .

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ColumnsGenerated
member.summary: Occurs when the are auto-generated.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ColumnMappingPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a property name, which is used to categorize the columns.
member.remarks: If a list of is bound to property, will automatically categorize the items using property. If contains custom objects, the path of the property which can be used to categorize the card should be explicitly defined using this property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.AutoGenerateColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can be auto-generated based on the value.
member.remarks: A will be generated automatically only if the user does not specify the explicitly for a category using property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.MinimumColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.MaximumColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of the .
member.value: This property take the double value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.Columns
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of that belongs to .
member.value: Type: A that contains the collection of objects.
member.remarks: This is the ContentProperty of the . A determines the schema of the .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection used to generate the content of the .
member.remarks: will be populated with cards for the data in the ItemsSource. Each item in ItemsSource will be associated to a using either property or property depending on whether the item type is or custom model respectively.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets a template for the 's header.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ColorModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of , which is used to define the colors for each key.
member.remarks: To have a color indicator in the card, define the and map the ColorKey value to the corresponding item's property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.ActualColumns
member.summary: Gets the auto-generated s.
member.remarks: If is set to true and also are defined by user, this property will contain both the auto-generated s and also user specified . If is set to false, this property will contain only the user specified columns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.SfKanban.PlaceholderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance that provides the style for a card placeholder.

member.summary: Gets or sets a template for the Kanban card view.

member.summary: Gets or sets the workflows. Each item defines the workflow for a particular category, which is used to determine the target columns a card can be dropped.

members.member:
Gets or sets the Color value which specifies the selected placeholder's border color.
will be applied to the category's placeholder border, when a column is having multiple categories and card dragged over to a particular category.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Color value which specifies the selected placeholder's text color.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.KanbanErrorBarSettings
member.summary: This class is used to customize the appearance of error bar that appears in the 's header.
member.remarks: Error bar is a line that appears at the bottom of the header. The color of the error bar indicates whether the column reached the maximum/minimum allowed limit of cards.

member.summary: Identifies the bindable property.

member.summary: Intializes the instance of class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default Color value of the error bar.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.KanbanErrorBarSettings.MinValidationColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Color value of the error bar for validation.
member.remarks: will be applied to the error bar when 's card count is less than the value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfKanban.XForms.KanbanErrorBarSettings.MaxValidationColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the Color value of the error bar for the validation.
member.remarks: will be applied to the error bar when 's card count is greater than the value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the error bar.
